column4: Can I somehow install 10.04 using a newer kernel?  I need to run a cluster of 2 servers, the server product is tied to 10.04.  But 10.04 won't install on one piece of hardware (12.04 would).
The replacements machine is too recent to install 10.04 of CD
Back to the question of using a more recent kernel during install ? :)
bother :) ... i was afraid that was going to be the response.
